```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("tictoc", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("tictoc")

library(tictoc)

tic("time_tvae_sim")

results <- replicate(200,  
  tvae.sim(
     p_class1_real = 0.8 # class proportion for the "real" training set
    ,p_class1 =      0.2 # class proportion for the synth
    ,n_real =        500 # n for the "real" training set
    ,n_synth =       500 # n for the tvae
    ,p1_0 =          0.2     # 1 - sp test 1
    ,p1_1 =          0.8     #se test 1
    ,p2_0 =          0.1    # 1 -sp test 2
    ,p2_1 =          0.8     # se test 2  
    , epochs =       600  #number of training epochs
  ))


#make the results into a nice table
sim_summary_table(results,block_size = 2)$table

# look at the difference in the se and sp estimates for real an synth using effect size

sim_summary_table(results)$summary |> filter(stat != "Prev_pop1" & stat != "Prev_pop2" )%>%
  mutate(sd = (upper - lower) / 3.92) %>%
  group_by(stat) %>%
  summarise(
    d = {
      m1 <- median_val[source == "synthetic.data"]
      m2 <- median_val[source == "real.data"]
      sd1 <- sd[source == "synthetic.data"]
      sd2 <- sd[source == "real.data"]
      (m1 - m2) / sqrt((sd1^2 + sd2^2) / 2)
    }
  )
toc()
```
